page.title: 12INDUSTRY IN EAST HADDON.
page.content:
The village has several small industries. HADDONSTONE The headquarters of this local firm which specialises in garden ornaments,urns etc. for the upper end of the market. In the old forge are the experimental designs tested before transfer to the factory outside the village. MAGNETOPULSE A revolutionary way of treating injuries in horses. At present under investigation are the human applications/ implications. RAVENSTHORPE ROAD Market garden selling produce direct to the public.
In addition to the above there are also a small clothing factory making crimplene/polyester slacks for ladies and children, and a nursery selling a wide range of plants.
